topic.title: PERSONS ELIGIBLE FOR NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE (LAST DAY OF PREVIOUS REPORTING PERIOD)
topic.shortdesc: PERSONS ELIGIBLE FOR NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE (LAST DAY OF PREVIOUS REPORTING PERIOD) is the number of PERSONS eligible for NHS Continuing Healthcare as at the last day of the previous REPORTING PERIOD.
